objects.text:
• Spinning Palm Tree
• Adjustable Leaf Bed
• Relaxing Hammock
• 9 Pieces Included

product_details.description: Welcome to your Barbie World. Build your best Barbie life! Pounce into pet paradise with this kitty tower playset. Designed with a spinning palm tree, adjustable leaf bed, and relaxing hammock  there are so many pawesome ways for the two pet kitties to play. Also included is a bag of cat food, bowls, and toys. Doll sold separately. Colors and decorations may vary.

banner_details:
This playful and vibrant banner features a cheerful and colorful theme suitable for a children's toy promotion. The background consists of a layered abstract design with various softly blended shapes including pastel-colored waves, translucent geometric overlays, and playful circles, enhancing the playful atmosphere. The top text layer (`heading`) is bold and eye-catching in a bright pink font, clearly establishing the brand. Just below is a solid purple subheading (`subheading`) that introduces the theme. The feature list (`description`) is neatly organized in bullet points using a clean sans-serif font. At the bottom left, the bright pink price tag (`price`) is highly visible, accompanied by a rectangular button (`cta_background`) containing a clear, white call-to-action (`cta`). A colorful product image (`product_image`) on the right adds detail and focus.

**Color Palette:**
- Pink: `#FF80B9`, `#FF2D92`, `#FF4AA7`
- Purple: `#7D31B4`, `#A674E8`, `#4A3265`
- Mint Green: `#8BE0C3`
- Light Background: `#FFEBF5`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a vibrant toy set dominated by playful and pastel tones that appeal to children. The color palette is cheerful and includes Hot Pink (#EC498E), Mint Green (#6CD0A4), Sky Blue (#48CAFF), Light Lavender (#D1A9F9), Sandy Beige (#F7CFA0), and Soft Brown (#A05A2C). Each color is distinct yet well-blended to stand out against the others, creating visual harmony while maintaining individual highlights. For example, Hot Pink on the upper cat house contrasts sharply with the green foliage, drawing attention upwards. The turquoise platform and accessories add a fresh pop, while the pastel purple and light tan ground offer a balanced earth-tone base.
